moves.1. g4:
grob opening : 
best defense is d5....e5....kc6
always fighting for the center.
It this one, oponent choose some thing else, and wee will see that it will be soon a bad choice.
Never think grob is easy, because it has a lot of traps
moves.1... e5 2. h3 h6:
why h6 ???
this should be a bunder, oponent should anticipate bg2
moves.3. c4: so now i will control d5
moves.3... b6: no way, he has a tempo delay, i will be the first and he will have to defend
moves.4. Bg2:
for the moment i'm just developing my grob oppening, this is just the norml way
and black tacticals error just help me to achieve my grob
moves.5... Ba6:
this is not strong anyway, i stil have the control of the center
may be better whoulb bishop b7....d5...
moves.6. b3 Qf6: tactical error again : he should develop his game, queen is to soon, there is nothing to do whith this, and by the way, it is becoming dangerous for this queen...
moves.7... d6: i whould prefer kd7 develop, defend  and give freedom for the a rook whith was in danger, no ?
moves.8. dxe5 dxe5: so now the queen is still in danger
moves.9... Qd6:
i accept this because after that i will have a lot of oportunities
kf3xe5 ...ke5xc6...
and bishop b x g7 ...
moves.13. Bxg7 Rh7 14. Bf6: this exchang is in my favor, give me a tempo
i just whant to conserve my knight before a3
moves.17... c5: ho ho, he did not anticipate a3
expcting  black bishop x e4 then bishop in g2 take e4, black moves tower and bishop in c3 go to d5 wining the black bishop in b4...
moves.21... Rb8 22. Nd5+ Bxd5 23. cxd5 Rg7: why this ? there was no dangerfor his rook
moves.24. Rxa7: win a pawn and nailing the knight
moves.24... Kd8:
and black resign ! 
it was not finish, but they became disgusted of the king of game
sure grob opening is surprising and you should have good nerves, patince and caution to play against, ..and also to play whith !
